::Killfest/EndBringer::

Killfest nods, walking to the can and taking his left hand in his 
right. With several twists, he un-screws his left hand, a pump 
opening in it and beginning to leak mechfluid. Killfest holds his 
unhanded arm over the can, his mechfluid leaking into it. After a 
while he screws the hand back and looks for Motormaster, waiting for 
the next step.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
EndBringer looks at the ritual, having no idea of what was going on.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "NO" Motormaster states, "We need to return to base, but first, 
unhhhh" he
> strains, "I want to partake in an ancient cybertronian pact. We are 
allies
> of battle" with that he strainfully takes and odd shaped can from 
his chest
> component and places it on the ground of Astroblast, he thens grabs 
what is
> left of his left arm and opens a pipe in it. Fuel gushes out into 
the can.
> He looks to Killfest, waiting for him to do the same.
